title: My Husband Lost $150K Day Trading Behind My Back (Hour 1)
description:
Dr. John Delony & Rachel Cruze discuss:

Selling things vs. giving them away,

Whether or not to raise rent (on a relative),

Coping with horrific financial infidelity,

Making a career move to get out of debt.


Support Our Sponsor:

Zander Insurance

PODS Moving & Storage

Christian Healthcare Ministries


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
